name: Evans
description: Evans is known for superhero roles as Marvel comics characters

name: George Clooney
description: He has received three Golden Globe Awards for his work as an actor and two Academy Awards, one for acting in Syriana (2006) and the other for co-producing Argo (2012)

name: Jennifer Lawrence
description: She achieved wider recognition for starring as the mutant Mystique in X-Men: First Class

name: Robert Downey Jr
description: Downey topped the Forbes List of Hollywoods highest payed actors
